title: sharada vidhu
sahitya:
sharada vidhu vadananAmat prANa nAthan


anupallavi

  cAlavEyoru nAL nishivannarikil


caraNam 1    himakara ruci vilasunnoru saudhE iruvarumAyi smaralIla ceyyAn 
malayaja ghana pankam mEniyil mAnyananijnyu mulla mAla cUDi
    caraNam 2    smita sahitamatAkum mrdumozhi snEha mOdura ceytu melle melle 
vikaca kamaladaLattil kAntiyE vellum kaTAkSa matinAl mayakki
    caraNam 3    hima jAlamuDalODanE mama mukha kimapi taliCCu mandam tuDAccurasAl
virutu kaLura ceytum suratAndE vivashayAyidu menne mOhipiccum 
maruvu morabhjanAbhan tannE jnyAn madirAkSiyorikkalum marannIDumO
